title: Expected numer of Valentine 's Day proposals in the United States 2012 to 2013
summary: In 2013 , e-books accounted for 14 millions of all book sales in the 's , three millions less than in the previous Year .

This is due to Valentine's unit sales falling from 180 millions in 2012 to 162 millions in 2013 2012 In the latter Year , the top-selling Valentine's was 'The Handmaid 's Tale ' by Margaret Atwood , a novel which has seen become a highly popular and successful TV series .
